result.title: Publishable report on optimised combinations
result.description: D23 is linked to task 22 and will consist of a publishable report on the combination of the different alternative means of diseasespest control We expect the identification of the optimal schedules and compatible mixtures of pilot products with other PPPs essential for plant protection in the 3 crops citrus tomatopepper cucurbits to be used in combination with existing biological control strategies and the selection of best strategies proposed for testing in task 23 Lead FEM Partners involved IAMB BiPA UNIT

result.title: Publishable report on exploration of low/no copper strategies for current commercial grapevine, apple and glasshouse crops
result.description: D13 is linked to task 13 and will consist of a report on the Identification of 23 lowno copper strategies for current commercial grapevine apple and glasshouse crops The strategies will also include crop protection activities against the standard pests and diseases The knowhow gained here gives a first view and perspective for further reduction of copper and will be transferred to the RELACS partners in other European regions for task 14 Lead FEM Partners involved FiBL UNIT JKI FOA BioselenaLinked parties to IFOAMEU

result.title: Publishable report on the optimized use protocol for Clitoria ternatea extract and orange oil and description of prototype-shakers for vibration and playback code
result.description: D22 is linked to task 22 and will consist of a publishable report on the optimized use protocol for Clitoria ternatea extract and orange oil and description of prototypeshakers for vibration and playback code for the use of paraffin oil alternatives We expect to acquire knowledge on possible differences in cultivar responses phytotoxicity and efficacy to the pilot products and side effect on beneficial arthropods We expect a working prototype for vibrational mating disruption Lead FEM Partners involved IAMB BiPA UNIT

result.title: Publishable report on evaluation and validation of novel low/no copper
result.description: D14 is linked to task 14 and will consist of a report on the evaluation and validation of novel lowcopper strategies under semicommercial and commercial conditions on farm Close interaction between farmeradvisor groups and researchindustry teams providing alternative products Knowhow transfer and rapid adoption of strategies in other European regions Development of a realistic view and perspective for further reduction of copper Lead JKI Partners involved FiBL FEMUNIT IAMB TM SBT BiPA OMKI Soil Association ECOVALIA FederBio FOA Bioselena EOFF Bioforum ON Naturland OKOLOGISK LANDSFORENINGLinked parties to IFOAMEU
